name: Veggie Delight Menu:

description: For those who like a little heat, our Spicy Jalapeno Burger is a must-try.

name: Classic Burger

description: A timeless favorite featuring a juicy beef patty, melted American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and a special sauce.

name: Classic Favorites
description: This menu features all-time favorites like the Classic Cheeseburger, BBQ Bacon Burger, Mushroom Swiss Burger, and Veggie Burger.

description: Take your taste buds on a global journey with the Hawaiian Teriyaki Burger and Mediterranean Lamb Burger.

name: Black Burger

name: Bacon Blue Cheese Burger
description: Enjoy the rich and bold flavors of this burger, featuring crumbled blue cheese, crispy bacon and a zesty mayo.

name: Guacamole Burger
description: Get a taste of California with a juicy beef patty topped with fresh guacamole, melted Monterey Jack cheese and a zingy lime mayo.
